attributes.action: Lower Rail Fares And Make A Child Ticket To 16 Years And Under
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To Use pbulic transport it can be farely expensive! specailly for students coming either to and from school or college. on the other hand its more expenisve for students and normal working citizens as we have to pay full fare. I personally pay £20 a week to go two station there in the morning and two stations back!! its too expensive! help me lower the price!
